thread.title: The 25 Divey-ist Dive Bars in NYC
thread.title_full: The 25 Divey-ist Dive Bars in NYC

author: Patty Diez
title: The 25 Divey-ist Dive Bars in NYC
text:
Grimy, lovable spaces with solid beers and cheap eats
Referring to dive bars as "best" or superior to others is somewhat tricky, since none of the places on this map are vying for the title â€” as doing so would render it not a dive. So what makes for a true dive bar? We're not going to get into the criteria here. Instead, we're going to offer a broad list some of our favorite dives around New York and what makes them special.
These 25 bars are downright shitty, somewhat lovable, and absolutely solid its very low-key setting, where a beer under $5 is the norm and ordering food is not.
Don't see your favorite spot? We're sure you'll let us know in the comments. 
Note: Restaurants are listed based on geography, south to north in Manhattan, and north to south in Brooklyn.
